command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã vật tư %s1 và lô %s2 đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục lô.' else N'The record consisting of item %s1 and lot %s2 is invalid or already exists.' end

if exists(select 1 from @dmlo a left join dmlo b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.status = '0' and a.ma_lo like (rtrim(b.ma_lo) + '%') or b.ma_lo like (rtrim(a.ma_lo) + '%')) begin declare @v1 varchar(16), @v2 varchar(16) select @v1 = a.ma_vt, @v2 = a.ma_lo from @dmlo a left join dmlo b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.ma_lo like (rtrim(b.ma_lo) + '%') or b.ma_lo like (rtrim(a.ma_lo) + '%') select 'ma_lo' as field, replace(replace(@$exists, '%s1', rtrim(@v1)), '%s2', rtrim(@v2)) as message return end
insert into @@table select ma_vt, ma_lo, ten_lo, ten_lo2, ngay_nhap, ngay_sx, ngay_bdsd, ngay_kt, ngay_hhsd, ngay_hhbh, ma_vt2, sl_nhap, sl_xuat, ghi_chu, 1, @@userID, @@userID, getdate(), getdate(), '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null, '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null from @dmlo a where exists(select 1 from dmvt b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt) and not exists(select 1 from dmlo c where a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.ma_lo = c.ma_lo)
select '' as field, '' as message, 'on$&Identity;Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this);' as script return
